summary: Led the development, design, and maintenance of over 5000 content advertising widgets.

tasks.task: Led the development, design, and maintenance of over 5000 content advertising widgets using HTML/CSS and React (JavaScript / TypeScript).
Engineered and maintained a comprehensive library of reusable React components and context providers.
Designed all widget interfaces with modern HTML/CSS and responsive design techniques.
Utilized a custom-built performance dashboard to regularly assess and optimize widget CTR.
Applied modern web optimizations such as lazy loading and responsive images.
Communicated technical concepts with the Business Development team.
Selected as the first point-of-contact for WordPress-related issues.
